page.title: 20CONCLUSION: SPETCHLEY AREA
page.content: {WORCESTER SIXTH FORM COLLEGE,} newly opened in 1984, has been responsible for the compilation of this material. The information was collected by {14 and 15 year old students who are the last intake of the{former girls grammar school}on this site. Sixth formers and staff have helped with the visits, collation and recording of the text. Some of us have{used a computer {extensively for the first time. We also studied the life of this area, so near to our campus, for the first time. Much was new to us although we are familiar with Worcestershire. There is a{timelessness}about life styles here which contrastS with the pace we see elsewhere and which we enjoyed{glimpsing. - THANK YOU to the many local people who helped form our impressions of the area.
